title: US and India reach trade deal, Trump says after Modi call
summary_full: Tariffs will drop from 50% to 18% on Indian goods, while India has agreed to stop buying Russian oil.
summary_public: Tariffs will drop from 50% to 18% on Indian goods, while India has agreed to stop buying Russian oil.

RU.label: positive
RU.evidence: India has agreed to stop buying Russian oil
